items.title: Delta Green On Hold Until Early Next Year
items.content_html: Hi everyone. I am sorry to say that this game is going on hold until early next year. Right now I just need a break from it. I have been working non-stop on this game for over 4 years. I want to be able to work on some more original projects from now until early 2021. There will be an announcement popping up when I feel like I am ready to bring this game back. I may work on it from time to time, but I just need a break for the most part. I know this announcement is hard to take in, and I know there are supports for this game - and I thank you if you do - I just feel like I need this. I have informed the rest of the people working on this game about this. I guess I will end the post here. For the Delta Green game - see you next year.
